properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item DP-4 for Azure Database for PostgreSQL

features.featureName: Data at Rest Encryption Using Platform Keys
features.featureDescription: Data at-rest encryption using platform keys is supported, any customer content at rest is encrypted with these Microsoft managed keys.
features.featureGuidance: No additional configurations are required as this is enabled on a default deployment.
features.customerActionsDescription: Enable data at rest encryption by default

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: An Azure Active Directory administrator should be provisioned for PostgreSQL servers
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: Audit provisioning of an Azure Active Directory administrator for your PostgreSQL server to enable Azure AD authentication. Azure AD authentication enables simplified permission management and centralized identity management of database users and other Microsoft services
